remarks: Value of the strong sequence builder function at a successor. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Apr-2019.)
statement:
sseqval.1 $e |- ( ph -> S e. _V ) $.
sseqval.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. Word S ) $.
sseqval.3 $e |- W = ( Word S i^i ( `' # " ( ZZ>= ` ( # ` M ) ) ) ) $.
sseqval.4 $e |- ( ph -> F : W --> S ) $.
sseqfv2.4 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` ( # ` M ) ) ) $.
sseqp1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( M seqstr F ) ` N ) = ( F ` ( ( M seqstr F ) |` ( 0 ..^ N ) ) ) ) $.
